content.query:
--
--   Cost by ConsumedService
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    ,ConsumedService
    --,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/202*/Extended_v2_ACMMonthly*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, ConsumedService --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
